detail_desc: Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with sparkly-stone appliqués, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide jumper in a soft knit with a deep V-neck, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dungaree shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a front pocket and adjustable, crossover straps. Side pockets, back pockets, buttons at the sides and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.

Slim-fit jeans in soft superstretch denim with worn details and embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow, raw-edge hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with worn details and embroidery. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped chest pocket and side pocket, small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a tab and press-stud at the sides. Lined.

Biker jacket in imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip at the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped chest pocket and side pocket, small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a tab and press-stud at the sides. Lined.

Trainers in imitation suede with a small platform, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Platform front 2.5 cm, back 3.5 cm.

Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool. Sewn-on lace collar and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester in the jumper is recycled.

Set with a shirt and pair of trousers woven in a cotton blend. Long-sleeved shirt with a collar, chest pocket, buttons down the front and gently rounded hem. Pre-tied bow tie with elastic and a fastener at the back. Striped trousers with fake pockets and a diagonal fastening.
